name: basic-memory
description: Local-first knowledge management system that builds a semantic graph from Markdown files, enabling persistent memory across conversations with LLMs.

tools.name: delete_note
tools.description: Delete a note by title or permalink

tools.name: read_content
tools.description: Read a file's raw content by path or permalink

tools.name: build_context
tools.description:
Build context from a memory:// URI to continue conversations naturally.
    
    Use this to follow up on previous discussions or explore related topics.
    Timeframes support natural language like:
    - "2 days ago"
    - "last week" 
    - "today"
    - "3 months ago"
    Or standard formats like "7d", "24h"

tools.name: recent_activity
tools.description:
Get recent activity from across the knowledge base.
    
    Timeframe supports natural language formats like:
    - "2 days ago"  
    - "last week"
    - "yesterday" 
    - "today"
    - "3 weeks ago"
    Or standard formats like "7d"

tools.name: search_notes
tools.description: Search across all content in the knowledge base.

tools.name: read_note
tools.description: Read a markdown note by title or permalink.

tools.name: write_note
tools.description: Create or update a markdown note. Returns a markdown formatted summary of the semantic content.

tools.name: canvas
tools.description: Create an Obsidian canvas file to visualize concepts and connections.

tools.name: project_info
tools.description: Get information and statistics about the current Basic Memory project.
